creator: DailyFun
descriptionHtml:
Petdise - a full-stack service pet center that's a paradise for pets!
Are you ready to run your own pet center and be successful?

Run your pet center "Petdise" and become a Petdise Tycoon!
In Petdise Tycoon - idle game, you can.
-Open your own pet center.
-Treat cute pets
-Groom cute pets
-Train dogs
-Take in foster animals
-Make friendships with pet owners
-Experience heartwarming stories

Upgrade and expand your pet center, keep adding new features, expand your vault and get rich!

Expand your pet center to accept as many pets as possible. Increase the features of your pet center to meet the various needs of your customers. Upgrade your various offices to take maximum advantage of your staff for maximum efficiency and to provide the best service! Keep expanding your vault, developing technology, upgrading licenses, and reinvesting profits in your business

Befriend your customers, gain prestige among nearby pet owners, create shared memories with them, get involved in the heartwarming stories of their lives, and maybe even receive a special souvenir!

Run regular seasonal events! Upgrade your research lab, buy cutting-edge equipment, and help the Doctor research special pets to better serve pet owners!


Expand your pet center.

In addition to the pet hospital, there are other important departments such as pet merchandise, pet medicine, pet grooming, pet training area, and a pet boarding area to provide a full range of services for pets and owners.

Manage your staff.

Make your own decisions about what kind of employees to hire and place them in the most appropriate positions to maximize efficiency and profits! You can also train your employees to be good at what they do through staff training.

Upgrade your pet center.

Upgrade each office to provide a more comfortable and convenient working environment for your employees, so you can hire them at a lower salary and increase their productivity. It will also improve your guests' patience while they wait!

Provide VIP appointment service

Accept advance appointments for vip clients! You can gain more revenue and reap suggestions. And, perhaps, gain loyal customers?

Be friends with pet owners.

Provide more advice to pet owners through online communication, perhaps, not only in terms of keeping pets? Cultivate your loyal customers and participate in the warm stories between them and their pets, both as customers and friends!

Upgrade your tech tree!

Continuously research how to better enhance all aspects of your pet-related services, and make your pet center bigger and better known!


If you like management, simulations and idle games, you'll love Petdise Tycoon! It's a casual, easy to play game where strategic decisions must be made to manage a pet center and achieve profitable results. Perfect your empire by starting with an ordinary pet grooming room and developing a new business little by little. Build the best pet center ever!

Key Features.

- Fresh colors
- Lots of characters and heartwarming story
- Lots of room to expand
- Perfect combination of idle and simulator gameplay
- Souvenir system
- More space to operate
descriptionShort: Manage your pet center——'Petdise', build friendship with pets and owners!

appDetails.developerAddress: Horse Material Water, Shatin, New Territories, Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Run your pet center "Petdise" and become a Petdise Tycoon!!

title: Petdise Tycoon - Idle Game

container.value: Horse Material Water, Shatin, New Territories, Hong Kong

creator: DailyFun
descriptionHtml:
Petdise - A one-stop service center; a paradise for pets!
Can you successfully run your own pet center?

Expand your pet center to serve more clients:
-Add more functions to the center to meet clients' needs. Upgrade offices and manage employees to provide better service! Earn money, update technologies and certificates, and build an empire of pet service.

Befriend your clients and develop your reputation:
-By participating in their stories you will create memories together. Special gifts are waiting for you!

Regular seasonal events:
-Upgrade the laboratory, purchase cutting-edge devices, and help the doctor study special pets. A professional pet service provider, a real tycoon!

If you like management, simulator, and idle games, don't miss Petdise Tycoon! This is a casual, easy game. By making strategic decisions, you will successfully manage a pet center and achieve profitable results. Start with an ordinary pet grooming salon to build the best pet service empire!


Expand your pet center:
In addition to the pet hospital, other important departments such as pet supplies stores, pet clinics, pet grooming salons, pet training areas, and pet boarding areas will be built to provide comprehensive services.

Manage your employees:

Who would you like to hire? You are the boss. Assign them wisely to improve efficiency and profits. Employees can be trained to gain advantages.

Upgrade your pet center:

Upgrade offices to create a comfortable environment for working. Then you can hire employees who demand lower salaries and increase the patience of clients. That's what a tycoon does!

Provide VIP appointment service:

Make appointments and let your clients enjoy VIP services in your empire! Earn more profits and get more advice. Maybe a loyal client as well?

Be friend with pet owners:

Give more advice (not only on pet keeping, perhaps?) to pet owners through online chat. Help them rescue street animals and give these poor kids shelter. Get involved in their stories because they are not only your clients but also your friends!

Upgrade your technology tree:

Study how to better improve pet-related services and build a real pet service empire!


Features:

- Fresh colors
- Tons of characters and warm stories
- Lots of room to expand
- The perfect combination of idle and management simulator
- Souvenir system
- More space to run business"
descriptionShort: Run your pet center——'Petdise', expand your office and become a real tycoon!

descriptionShort: Run your pet center——'Petdise', expand your office and become a real tycoon!

appDetails.developerAddress: Horse Material Water, Shatin, New Territories, Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
PETDISE YCOON - IDLE GAME version 0.99 is here! Hurry up to update!

1. The values have been adjusted! You can play more easily!
2. More guides have been added! Don't worry about not knowing what to do anymore!
3. Added tips! No more missing your offline earnings!
4. Optimized ui! The game operation is more comfortable!
5. Fixed the network problem!

Petdise - A one-stop service center; a paradise for pets!
Can you successfully run your own pet center?

title: Petdise Tycoon - Idle Game

container.value: Horse Material Water, Shatin, New Territories, Hong Kong

creator: DailyFun
descriptionHtml:
Petdise - A one-stop service center; a paradise for pets!
Can you successfully run your own pet center?

Expand your pet center to serve more clients:
-Add more functions to the center to meet clients' needs. Upgrade offices and manage employees to provide better service! Earn money, update technologies and certificates, and build an empire of pet service.

Befriend your clients and develop your reputation:
-By participating in their stories you will create memories together. Special gifts are waiting for you!

Regular seasonal events:
-Upgrade the laboratory, purchase cutting-edge devices, and help the doctor study special pets. A professional pet service provider, a real tycoon!

If you like management, simulator, and idle games, don't miss Petdise Tycoon! This is a casual, easy game. By making strategic decisions, you will successfully manage a pet center and achieve profitable results. Start with an ordinary pet grooming salon to build the best pet service empire!


Expand your pet center:
In addition to the pet hospital, other important departments such as pet supplies stores, pet clinics, pet grooming salons, pet training areas, and pet boarding areas will be built to provide comprehensive services.

Manage your employees:

Who would you like to hire? You are the boss. Assign them wisely to improve efficiency and profits. Employees can be trained to gain advantages.

Upgrade your pet center:

Upgrade offices to create a comfortable environment for working. Then you can hire employees who demand lower salaries and increase the patience of clients. That's what a tycoon does!

Provide VIP appointment service:

Make appointments and let your clients enjoy VIP services in your empire! Earn more profits and get more advice. Maybe a loyal client as well?

Be friend with pet owners:

Give more advice (not only on pet keeping, perhaps?) to pet owners through online chat. Help them rescue street animals and give these poor kids shelter. Get involved in their stories because they are not only your clients but also your friends!

Upgrade your technology tree:

Study how to better improve pet-related services and build a real pet service empire!


Features:

- Fresh colors
- Tons of characters and warm stories
- Lots of room to expand
- The perfect combination of idle and management simulator
- Souvenir system
- More space to run business
descriptionShort: Run your pet center——'Petdise', expand your office and become a real tycoon!
